original_text: Strong rain with stones of ice fell from the sky. The stones hit people and caused them great pain. The weight of each stone was about 50 kilograms. The people cursed God because the strong rain and the stones of ice caused them to have such terrible pain.
korean_text: 또 무게가 한 달란트나 되는 큰 우박이 하늘로부터 사람들에게 내리매 사람들이 그 우박의 재앙 때문에 하나님을 비방하니 그 재앙이 심히 큼이러라

sentences.original_text: Strong rain with stones of ice fell from the sky
sentences.korean_translation: 얼음 돌을 동반한 강한 비가 하늘에서 내려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: The weight of each stone was about 50 kilograms
because the strong rain and the stones of ice
caused them to have such terrible pain
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 그런 끔찍한 고통을 주었기 때문입니다
